title: Miser's Purse, early 19th century
description: Crocheted maroon silk evenly ornamented with cut steel beads; opening at side controlled by two octagonal cut steel rings.  Four lined tassels of steel beads at each end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Miser's Purse, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: silk, metal
Technique: crocheted. Gift of Mrs. Albert Blum. 1953-106-53.
